1.name: Default
1.description: Heya! My name's Neptune! Nice to meet you!

limitBreak.tier2: Torpedo Base +1, Torpedo Pre-Load +1, Torpedo Efficiency +10%

1.name: Main Character Correction
1.description: If a Neptunia ship is present in the fleet, increase own damage by 3% (10%) and decrease damage received by 6%. Also increases own damage by 1% (2%), and decreases damage received by 1% for each Neptunia ship, excluding herself.

1.chinese: 呀吼～我的名字是涅普顿！这就是《碧蓝航线》世界吗…只能趁势而上了呢！冲上这股巨浪的浪尖！
1.chineseTL: Yahoo~! My name is Neptune! Is this the world of "Azur Lane"...? I can only go straight ahead then, crashing upon the tip of this giant wave!
1.japanese: やっほー！わたしの名前はネプテューヌ！よろしくね！
1.japaneseTL: Yahoo! My name is Neptune! Nice to meet you!
1.english: Heya! My name's Neptune! Nice to meet you!

2.chinese: 我就是主人公中的主人公——涅普顿！我可是紫曜之都(Planeptune)的女神哦——嗯？你问女神是什么？要说起来话可就长了，还是改天再说吧
2.chineseTL: I am the protagonist among protagonist - Neptune! I'm the CPU of "Planeptune" alright? You're asking what a "CPU" is? That is a long story, let's save it for another time.
2.japanese: 主人公オブ主人公ことネプテューヌだよ！プラネテューヌって国の女神なんだー。女神って何って？説明すると長くなっちゃうからまた今度ね。
2.japaneseTL: I'm the protagonist of protagonists, Neptune! I'm the CPU of the country Planeptune. What's a CPU? It's complicated, so I'll explain some other time.
2.english: I'm the protiest of protagonists, Neptune! I'm the CPU of a country called Planeptune. What's a CPU? It's a long story, so I'll tell you another time.

3.chinese: 呀吼~！我的名字叫涅普顿，多多关照啦！
3.chineseTL: Yahoo~! My name is Naptune, I'll be in your favor!
3.japanese: やっほー！　わたしの名前はネプテューヌ！よろしくね！
3.japaneseTL: Yahoo! My name is Neptune! Nice to meet you!
3.english: Heya! My name's Neptune! Nice to meet you!

4.chinese: 欢迎回来~今天也要加油涅普！
4.chineseTL: Welcome back~ We have to work hard today too- nep!
4.japanese: おかえりー！今日も一日がんばるねぷっ！
4.japaneseTL: Welcome back! Let's give it all we got nep!
4.english: Welcome back! Let's give it all we've got, nep!

5.chinese: 被这样盯着看还是有点害羞呀
5.chineseTL: It is still a bit embarrassing when I get stared at like that.
5.japanese: そんなにジロジロ見られると照れちゃうな
5.japaneseTL: It's embarrassing when you stare at me so much.
5.english: It's so embarrassing when people stare at me like that.

6.chinese: 哼哼~你看~这个部件怎么样？完完全全是《Azurlane》定制款哦~是不是和我非常搭配！
6.chineseTL: Hmm mm~ Look~ what do you think about my rig? This is tailored toootallly for "Azur Lane"~ isn't it very compatiable with me?
6.japanese: ふふーん。このパーツどう？なんでも「アズールレーン」仕様なんだってー。わたしにぴったりでしょ！
6.japaneseTL: Heheh. How does my rig look? Everything's all Azur Lane-ish. Don't you think it looks perfect on me?
6.english: Heheh! How's my rigging look? It's all so Azur Laney! Looks good on me, don'tcha think?

7.chinese: 涅普涅普♪涅普涅普~♪涅普涅普涅普普♪
7.chineseTL: Nep Nep♪ Nep Nep♪ Nep nep neppynep♪
7.japanese: ねっぷねっぷ♪ねっぷねぷー♪ねぷねぷねっぷっぷ♪
7.japaneseTL: Nep Nep♪ Nep Nep♪ Nep nep neppynep♪
7.english: Nep nep♪ Nep nep♪ Nep nep neppynep♪

8.chinese: 肚子好饿……指挥官，给我带个布丁~
8.chineseTL: I'm so hungry... Commander, give me pudding~~
8.japanese: お腹すいたー……指揮官、プリンもってきてー
8.japaneseTL: I'm hungry… Commander, bring me some pudding!
8.english: I'm hungry... Go get me some pudding, Commander!

9.japanese: あはは、くすぐったいよーもう！
9.english: Ahahah! That tickles! Stop it, will you!

10.chinese: 喂喂，不能这样哦，指挥官
10.chineseTL: Hey, hey, you can't do that, Commander.
10.japanese: ちょっとー、そこはダメだよ指揮官
10.english: Hey! You can't do that, Commander!

11.chinese: 诶~任务？给我5个布丁的话，也不是不能帮忙哦？······开玩笑的啦~快点解决掉吧！
11.chineseTL: Eh~ Task? If you give me 5 puddings, it's not as if I can't help? .... I'm kidding~ Let's hurry and get it over with!
11.japanese: えー、任務ぅ？プリン5個で手伝ってあげてもいいよ？……冗談だってばー。はやく終わらせよ！
11.japaneseTL: Huh, a mission? I'll help if you give me 5 portions of pudding, how's that? Hey, I'm just kidding. Let's hurry up and finish it!
11.english: Me, do some missions? I'll help if you give me 5 servings of pudding, how's that? ...I'm just kidding! Let's get out there and finish it!

12.chineseTL: Task--- complete! We got the rewards!
12.japanese: 任務おーわり！ボーナスゲットー！

13.chinese: 邮件~来啦！现在可不是吃布丁的时候！
13.chineseTL: Mail~ is here! Now isn't the time to eat pudding!
13.japanese: メールキター！　プリン食べてる場合じゃないよ！
13.japaneseTL: Mail for you! Now's not the time to be eating pudding!
13.english: You have new mail! Now's not the time for pudding!

14.chinese: 布丁正在召唤着我···！快回家吧！
14.chineseTL: Pudding is summmoning me...! Let's hurry back home!
14.japanese: プリンがわたしを呼んでいる…！早く帰ろ！
14.japaneseTL: The pudding is calling for me…! I gotta get back home!
14.english: Oh, the pudding is calling out to me...! We gotta get back home!

15.chinese: 啊！大家都回来了哦！我们快去迎接她们吧~？
15.chineseTL: Ah! Everyone is home! Let's hurry and welcome then~?
15.japanese: あ！みんな戻ってきたよ！早く迎えに行こ？
15.japaneseTL: Ah! Everyone's back! Come on, let's go welcome them.
15.english: Hey! Everyone's back! Shouldn't we head out and welcome them?

16.japanese: ちゃらららったったったーん

17.chinese: 让你们看看主人公的力量吧！
17.chineseTL: I'll let you witness the strength of a protagonist then!
17.japanese: 主人公の力、見せちゃうもんねー！
17.japaneseTL: I'll show you the power of a protagonist!
17.english: Witness the might of a protagonist!

18.chineseTL: A victory for justice! Just kidding~
18.english: Justice will always win! Just kidding...

19.chinese: 非常遗憾 涅普子 输掉了
19.chineseTL: It's a shame but Neptune, lost.
19.japanese: おきのどくですが　ねぷこさんは　まけてしまいました
19.japaneseTL: I regret to inform you that Neppy has been defeated.
19.english: We regret to inform you that Neppy has been defeated.

20.chinese: 看我把你们涅普涅普掉！
20.chineseTL: I'll neppy nep you all up!
20.japanese: ねっぷねぷにしてやんよー！
20.japaneseTL: I'll neppy nep you all up!

21.chinese: 涅普！？还没到需要慌张的时侯啦
21.chineseTL: Nep!? It's not yet time to get nervous though!
21.japanese: ねぷっ！？まだあわてるような状況じゃないよ
21.japaneseTL: Nep!? It's not time to panic just yet!
21.english: Nep?! It's not time to panic just yet!

22.chinese: 诶？你说什么？耳朵里进香蕉了听不见~
22.chineseTL: Eh? What did you say? I have a banana stuffed in my ears so I can't hear you.
22.japanese: え？なんて？　耳にバナナが入っててよく聞こえなーい
22.japaneseTL: Huh? What did you say? There's a banana in my ear so I can't you very well.
22.english: Huh? What was that? I can't hear you, I've got bananas stuck in my ears.

23.chinese: 偶尔出门活动一下也不错嘛。指挥官，下次一起去散步好不好？
23.chineseTL: It isn't bad to go out once in a while, Commander. Let's take a walk next time alright?
23.japanese: たまには外で体を動かすのも悪くないねー。指揮官！今度どこかいっしょに散歩でもいかない？
23.japaneseTL: It ain't so bad to exercise outdoors every once in a while. Commander! How about we go for a walk somewhere this time?
23.english: Going out for some exercise every now and then isn't so bad! Hey, Commander! What do you say we go for a walk together next time?

24.chinese: 对了！指挥官下次一起去Planeptune玩呀。大家一定会很开心的！
24.chineseTL: Right! Next time let's have Commander visit Planeptune to play. Everyone would be very happy!
24.japanese: そうだ！指揮官。プラネテューヌにも遊びに来てよ！きっとみんなも喜ぶと思うなー。
24.japaneseTL: Oh, I know! Commander, come visit Planeptune some time! I'm sure everyone will be happy to see you.

25.chinese: 抓住指挥官了！来玩游戏呀，今晚可不会让你睡的喔！
25.chineseTL: I got hold of Commander! Let's play games, I won't let you sleep tonight!
25.japanese: 指揮官ゲットー！これから一緒にゲームするよー！いい？今夜は眠らせないんだからねっ。
25.japaneseTL: I've caught you, Commander! Now we're gonna play some games together! Listen: I'm not letting you sleep tonight.

26.chinese: 今天玩什么游戏呢？猜意中人的游戏？嗯…指挥官喜欢的是…就是我！哼哼，猜中了吧？
26.chineseTL: What game shall we play today? Guess-a-Crush? Mm... The one Commander likes is... me! Hehe, did I guess right?
26.japanese: 今日はなんのゲームする？好きな人を当てるゲーム？うーん、指揮官の好きな人はー……ズバリ、わたし！ふふーん当たってるでしょ？
26.japaneseTL: What game should we play today? Guess-their-crush? Hmm, the Commander's crush… that's gotta be me! Heheh, I hit the bulls-eye, didn't I?

27.chinese: 来到这个世界，我非常不安。和指挥官相遇，并且变成指挥官最珍视的人…现在发自心底觉得来到这个世界真的太好了。所以从今往后也请多关照！
27.chineseTL: I was very uneasy when I came to this world. Being able to meet Commander, and then becoming the one Commander views as most precious... I now feel that being able to come to this world is really great. So from now on, please take care of me!
27.japanese: 本当はこの世界に来て不安だったんだけど、指揮官と出会えて、そして指揮官の大切な人になれて…この世界に来てよかったって心の底から思ってるんだ。だから、これからもよろしくね！
27.japaneseTL: To be honest, I was anxious when I came to this world, but after meeting you and becoming your special girl… I'm happy from the bottom of my heart that I came here. So, here's hoping for a bright future together!

28.chinese: 诺瓦露！来比看看谁打倒的敌人更多吧！
28.chineseTL: Noire! Let's see who defeated the most enemies then!
28.japanese: ノワール！どっちが沢山倒せるか勝負だからね！
28.japaneseTL: Noire! Let's see who can beat the most enemies!

29.japanese: よーっし、みんなでいっくよー！
